models.notifications: Individual nudges sent to users with actions and status tracking
models.notificationPreferences: Per-user settings for which notifications to receive

relationships: Each HouseholdMember has their own NotificationPreferences
Notifications are delivered based on user preferences and role
Crisis Day Mute overrides all notification delivery for that user

notifications.message: Tonight: Sheet Pan Salmon (Aaron cooking). All ingredients on hand. Ready to go!
Friendly reminder: move chicken to fridge tonight for Wednesday's stir fry.
Still on for Taco Tuesday tomorrow? Just checking — tap if plans changed.
Next week's plan is ready — 3 minutes to review and approve?
Any salmon left from last night? Don't let it go to waste!
Anyone home? Can you check if we have soy sauce?
Hey Katie — you're cooking tomorrow. Taco Tuesday is on the menu. Got it?

fandomVoiceExamples._note: Examples of how notifications change with different voices

default.thaw-guardian: Friendly reminder: move chicken to fridge tonight for tomorrow's stir fry.

samwise.thaw-guardian: There's some good in this world, Mr. Frodo, and it's worth cooking for. Chicken goes in the fridge tonight!

nacho-libre.thaw-guardian: Beneath the clothes, we find a man. Beneath the freezer, we find tomorrow's chicken. Move it to the fridge!

the-office.thaw-guardian: That chicken needs to thaw. That's what she said. Move it to the fridge for tomorrow.

star-wars.thaw-guardian: The chicken... it calls to you. Move it to the fridge, you must.

harry-potter.thaw-guardian: Zylo has a reminder! Chicken must go to the fridge for tomorrow, or dinner will be most disappointing!
